Class Counter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.espertech.esper.metrics.codahale_metrics.metrics.core.Counter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Metric

    public class Counter
extends java.lang.Object
implements Metric
    An incrementing and decrementing counter metric.
